metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37322 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: GCC c++filt v2.26 was discovered to contain a use-after-free vulnerability via the component cplus-dem.c.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. ccdm94> the suggested patch for this CVE is the same as the one considered for CVE-2016-2226.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
